name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Proficient Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions, emphasizing **Python**, **Machine Learning**, and **Artificial Intelligence**. Adept at creating and managing **RAG systems** and utilizing **Databricks** for data processing and analytics. Deep experience in modern technologies includes hands-on expertise in **CI/CD**, **Infrastructure as Code**, and **Kubernetes**, ensuring robust software delivery pipelines. Skilled in leveraging **MLflow** for managing machine learning workflows and model deployment, as well as **Seldon** and **Mosaic** for enhanced ML operational capabilities. Strong background in data security and governance practices, ensuring compliance and protection of sensitive data.

Additionally, brings practical experience from healthcare and finance domains, with a strong focus on building cloud-native applications using **Azure** and **AWS**. An excellent communicator in English, dedicated to crafting systems that are not only technically robust but also contribute substantial real-world impact.
